column3: caption
column4: Chn

column3:
This is story of a boy 
 who did not do so 
 well in math, Jiwoo.
column4: 这是一个数学成绩不太好的男孩 Jiwoo 的故事。

column3:
And a mathematician who 
 tried his best to hide his 
 identity, Mr. Hakseong.
column4: 还有一个极力隐藏自己身份的数学家学城先生。

column3:
And a girl full of sense 
 of responsibity and honesty.
column4: 和一个充满责任感和诚实的女孩。

column3:
Jiwoo: i am finding it hard to keep up
 with this hard curriculum specially in math
column4: Jiwoo：我发现很难跟上这个艰苦的课程，尤其是在数学方面

column3:
Jiwoo: this class is full 
 of geniuses, i am not
  one of them
column4: Jiwoo：这个班全是天才，我不是其中之一

column3:
principal/teacher: 
 i think you should transfer to another school, 
 your grades are dropping very quickly
column4: 校长/老师：我觉得你应该转学，你的成绩下降得很快

column3:
Jiwoo: how can i tell my mother 
 that i am failing in math class?
column4: Jiwoo：我怎么能告诉我妈妈我数学课不及格呢？

column3:
teacher: Jiwoo was caught 
 last night with beer bottles, 
 who were you taking these for?
column4: 老师：Jiwoo 昨晚拿着啤酒瓶被抓了，你拿这些给谁？

column3: Jiwoo: it's for me. no one else :(
column4: Jiwoo：这是给我的。没有别人了 ：（

column3:
the security guard who caught 
 Jiwoo with beer bottles catches 
 him again lurking around
column4: 用啤酒瓶抓到智宇的保安再次抓到他潜伏

column3:
I can only wander around now. 
 It's getting dark. The old security 
 guard or janitor guy! People said 
 that he is a defect from North Korea
 ... Damn commies!
 After all, He is to blame! What?
  Here he comes again?!
column4: 我现在只能四处游荡。天快黑了。老保安或看门人！人们说他是朝鲜的缺陷……该死的共产党员！毕竟，他是罪魁祸首！什么？他又来了？！

column3:
security guard/janitor mr
  Hakseong agrees to let him 
 stay with him at night
column4: 保安/看门人 Hakseong 先生同意让他晚上陪在他身边

column3:
Hakseong: what are those? 
 are those his math homework? 
 let me take a look.
column4: Hakseong：那些是什么？这些是他的数学作业吗？让我看一看。

column3:
Hakseong sits throught the night 
 to solve questions for Jiwoo's 
 homework without his knowledge
column4: Hakseong 彻夜坐着在 Jiwoo 不知情的情况下解决他的家庭作业问题

column3:
the next day, in class Jiwoo realises 
 that all of his solutions are correct! 
 how did this happen?
column4: 第二天，在课堂上 Jiwoo 意识到他所有的解决方案都是正确的！这怎么发生的？

column3:
Jiwoo realises that probably 
 the security gurad/janitor
  solved them at night when 
 he was asleep
column4: Jiwoo 意识到可能是保安/看门人在他睡着的晚上解决了他们

column3:
Jiwoo begs Hakseong again,
  but this time to teach him math
column4: Jiwoo再次求Hakseong，但这次是教他数学

column3:
In order to persuade Mr. Hakseong to teach him, 
 Jiwoo even bought some of his favorite drinks 
 and left them in his refrigerator
column4: 为了说服学城老师教他，智宇还买了一些自己喜欢的饮料放在冰箱里

column3:
finally mr Hakseong
  consented and said
  he would teach him
column4: 最后学成先生同意了，说要教他

column3:
Hakseong: I would teach you. 
 But don't you dare telling anyone about it
column4: Hakseong：我会教你。但你不敢告诉任何人

column3:
And you shall not ask
  me anything besides Math.
column4: 你不应该问我除了数学之外的任何问题。

column3:
And if you study just for getting 
 higher grade, forget about it.
column4: 而且，如果您只是为了获得更高的成绩而学习，那就算了。

column3:
Mr. Hakseong taught Jiwoo to focus on truth,
  instead of answers. Because if you focus 
 on only the answers, you would neglect 
 about the true. Math is about the truth.
column4: Hakseong 先生教导 Jiwoo 专注于真相，而不是答案。因为如果你只关注答案，你就会忽视真相。数学是关于真理的。

column3:
And the way to learn math is to make friend 
 with it. So why don't you calculate square 
 root 2 to the 200th decimal place manually?
column4: 学习数学的方法就是和它交朋友。那么，为什么不手动计算平方根 2 到小数点后第 200 位呢？

column3:
Mr. Hakseong taught Jiwoo to make friends
 with numbers by calculating root
column4: Hakseong先生通过计算根教Jiwoo与数字交朋友

column3:
And sometimes, Hakseong is not that "cold".
 When it comes to math, Hakseong is full of
  enthusiasm. He can spend hours adoring 
 math formula, something called "Euler"
column4: 而有时候，学城也没有那么“冷”。谈到数学，Hakseong 充满了热情。他可以花几个小时崇拜数学公式，一种叫做“欧拉”的东西

column3:
Boram: those guys are getting away 
 with their mistakes, why are you 
 covering for them?
column4: Boram：那些人都在逃避他们的错误，你为什么要包庇他们？

column3:
Jiwoo: It doesn't matter, 
 I am going to be fine!
column4: Jiwoo：没关系，我会没事的！

column3:
boram was surprised by how
  well Jiwoo was doin in class
column4: 宝蓝对智宇在课堂上的表现感到惊讶

column3:
boram sniffed around to find 
 that Jiwoo is solving math 
 problems withan old man
column4: 宝蓝四处嗅探，发现智宇正在和一个老人一起解数学题

column3:
she tries to get herself to 
 stay in the class with mr 
 Hakseong by promising 
 that she will never tell anyone
column4: 她承诺永远不会告诉任何人，试图让自己留在 Hakseong 老师的班级里

column3:
hakseong finally gives up 
 and lets her stay and teach 
 her math as well
column4: hakseong终于放弃了，让她留下来教她数学

column3:
hakseong: mathematics is beautiful! 
 The pi can be played on the piano!
column4: hakseong：数学很美！圆周率可以在钢琴上弹奏！

column3:
hak taught boram that pi 
 can be learnt on the piano,
  if each note can be replaced
  with a number
column4: hak 教 boram 可以在钢琴上学习 pi，如果每个音符都可以用数字代替

column3:
numbers after decimal can
  be played into a beautiful 
 melody on a piano
column4: 小数点后的数字可以在钢琴上演奏成优美的旋律

column3:
The math olympiad is a decisive test.
  Students who pass will 
 be allowed to graduate.
column4: 数学奥林匹克竞赛是一项决定性的考试。通过考试的学生将被允许毕业。

column3:
the olympiad was a difficult exam. 
 Everyone started preparing for it.
column4: 奥林匹克竞赛是一场艰难的考试。每个人都开始为此做准备。

column3:
Boram was forced to a tutor "Euler Studio" 
 session to prepare for the math Olympia.
column4: Boram 被迫参加导师“Euler Studio”课程，为数学奥林匹亚做准备。

column3: She was not comfortable with this exclusive tuition
column4: 她对这种独家学费感到不舒服

column3: Jiwoo continues to be mentored by Mr. Hakseong.
column4: Jiwoo 继续接受 Hakseong 先生的指导。

column3:
Jiwoo and Hakseong and 
 Boram continue with classes
column4: Jiwoo、Hakseong 和 Boram 继续上课

column3: many days pass, days turn into months
column4: 许多天过去了，日子变成了几个月

column3:
Jiwoo is much better in math,
  he can even argue with his 
 teachers over solutions
column4: Jiwoo 的数学要好得多，他甚至可以和老师争论解决方案

column3:
The Euler Studio started to teach Boram 
 how to solve a specific set of questions.
column4: Euler Studio 开始教 Boram 如何解决一组特定的问题。

column3:
on the day of the olympiad, 
 she realises that the questions 
 are exact copy of the one's
  she solved in the tuition
column4: 在奥林匹克竞赛的那天，她意识到这些问题与她在补习班中解决的问题完全相同

column3:
Boram felt furious and utter shame for 
 what her parents set her into. This was cheating! 
 She was devastated and gave up on 
 the Olympiad on the spot.
column4: Boram 对父母让她陷入的境地感到愤怒和极度羞愧。这是作弊！她悲痛欲绝，当场放弃了奥林匹克竞赛。

column3:
Boram notifies the concerned
  people through a facebook page, 
 anonymously, about the leaked questions
column4: Boram 通过 Facebook 页面以匿名方式通知有关人员泄露的问题

column3:
the math teacher accuses 
 Jiwoo of leasking the papers
column4: 数学老师指责智宇泄露试卷

column3:
when the authorities see Jiwoo going 
 in the printer room, Jiwoo could not defend himself
column4: 当当局看到 Jiwoo 进入打印机室时，Jiwoo 无法为自己辩护

column3:
he was expelled from the school
  and was forced transfer to 
 a community school
column4: 他被学校开除并被迫转到社区学校

column3:
new challenges lied ahead of 
 Jiwoo as he changed schools
column4: Jiwoo 转校后面临新的挑战

column3:
But Jiwoo was actually printing out a Mathematic
  paper for Mr. Hakseong to read so that 
 Mr. Hakseong's desire on math could be satisfied.
column4: 可智宇其实是在打印一份数学论文给学成先生看，满足学成先生对数学的渴望。

column3:
boram believed in truth, 
 and she could not stand 
 being in a school which 
 was so dishonest, so she 
 joined the school Jiwoo 
 transferred to.
column4: boram 相信真理，她无法忍受在一个如此不诚实的学校里，所以她加入了 Jiwoo 转学的学校。

column3:
this school did not have too many
  genius people and the math classes
 were not very difficult
column4: 这所学校没有太多的天才，数学课也不是很难

column3:
with lowered math difficulty, 
 and his regualr classes with Hakseong, 
 Jiwoo found that he is able to score well in class
column4: 随着数学难度的降低，以及他与 Hakseong 的常规课程，Jiwoo 发现他能够在课堂上取得很好的成绩

column3:
With what he learned from Mr. Hakseong, 
 Jiwoo started to help his friends with math.
column4: 凭借从 Hakseong 老师那里学到的知识，Jiwoo 开始帮助他的朋友们学习数学。

column3:
And he was willing to “walk the second mile”
  with whoever needs his help.
column4: 谁需要他的帮助，他就愿意“走第二里路”。

column3: But he was able to adjust well.
column4: 但他能够很好地适应。

column3:
Jiwoo and Mr. Hakseong went to the bookstore, 
 Jiwoo bought him a stuffed toy as a present, 
 for helping him out so much.
column4: 智宇和鹤城老师去书店，智宇帮他做了这么多，给他买了一个毛绒玩具作为礼物。

column3:
At the book store, some people
  recognized the mathematician!
column4: 在书店，有人认出了这位数学家！

column3:
hakseong later realised that he
  was being monitored by 
 North Korean government
column4: hakseong 后来意识到他正受到朝鲜政府的监视

column3:
North Korea claims that 
 the South kidnapped their top scientist, 
 who has solved the Riemann's Theorem
column4: 朝鲜声称韩国绑架了他们解决了黎曼定理的顶尖科学家

column3:
The prove of Reimann's theorem is an 
 earthquake to the math field, it will put
  an end to the current prime number 
 based cryptogram system and could 
 be a powerful weapon to North Korea 
 government to change the world.
column4: 莱曼定理的证明对数学界来说是一场地震，它将终结目前基于素数的密码系统，并可能成为朝鲜政府改变世界的有力武器。

column3: so he decided to run away!
column4: 所以他决定逃跑！

column3:
He took the first train in the 
 morning and left the city.
column4: 他乘坐早上的第一班火车离开了这座城市。

column3:
Jiwoo and Boram were worried 
 about Mr. Hakseong and they 
 went out to look for him.
column4: Jiwoo 和 Boram 担心 Hakseong 先生，他们出去寻找他。

column3:
they looked everywhere, 
 but the could not find Mr. Hakseong.
column4: 他们到处寻找，但找不到Hakseong先生。

column3:
Soon, they realized that North Korean
  agents we watching them as well…
column4: 很快，他们意识到我们也在监视他们的朝鲜特工……

column3: So they figured that they need to do something to help Mr. Hakseong.
column4: 所以他们认为他们需要做点什么来帮助 Hakseong 先生。

column3:
So they decided to split! 
 But they continued their 
 search for their beloved mentor.
column4: 于是他们决定分手！但他们继续寻找他们心爱的导师。

column3:
Boram found Mr. Hakseong 
 and informed him 
 of the current situation
 How Jiwoo is accused of leaking the paper, 
 and that he has been expelled
column4: 宝蓝找到学成先生，告知他目前的情况，智宇被指控泄露论文，已被开除

column3:
Mr. Hakseong realized that 
 in order to redress an injustice
  for Jiwoo, he needed
  to expose himself.
column4: Hakseong 先生意识到，为了为 Jiwoo 伸冤，他需要暴露自己。

column3:
Hakseong wrote to his 
 mathematician friend to ask for help.
column4: Hakseong 写信给他的数学家朋友寻求帮助。

column3:
Mr. Hakseong decided to go to Jiwoo's 
 school to confront the math teacher.
column4: Hakseong 先生决定去 Jiwoo 的学校与数学老师对质。

column3:
With the paper printed by Jiwoo, 
 Mr. Hakseong was able to confront 
 the Math teacher of the frame 
 that he put on Jiwoo.
column4: 有了智宇打印的试卷，鹤城先生得以与他放在智宇身上的画框里的数学老师对峙。

column3:
The mathematician friend found out 
 through his connection that it was the
  math teacher who was behind the 
 Euler's studio, and made a lot of money 
 by leaking the Olympia questions.
column4: 这位数学家朋友通过他的关系得知原来欧拉工作室的幕后黑手就是数学老师，并通过泄露奥林匹亚题大赚了一笔。

column3:
The math teacher was blamed for 
 leaking of olympiad question paper!
column4: 数学老师泄露奥数试卷被骂！

column3:
The school board decided to punish 
 the math teacher and fire him effectively. 
 This decision also led to Jiwoo's 
 return to the school.
column4: 学校董事会决定惩罚数学老师并有效解雇他。这个决定也让智宇回到了学校。

column3:
Mr. Hakseong remains uncertain
  about his future as he fears 
 that North Korean agents may 
 come again soon.
column4: Hakseong 先生仍然不确定自己的未来，因为他担心朝鲜特工可能很快就会再次出现。

column3:
However, his old friend, a nearby recycle dealer, 
 who is actually a secret South Korean agent 
 tasked with protecting him,
column4: 然而，他的老朋友，附近的回收商，实际上是韩国的秘密特工，负责保护他，

column3:
has received orders
  from the government to send Mr. Hakseong to 
 Germany for ultimate protection.
column4: 已收到政府命令，将 Hakseong 先生送往德国进行最终保护。

column3: It turns out that even the fake passport is prepared.
column4: 原来连假护照都准备好了。

column3:
Farewell, Mr. Hakseong. 
 Hope we can be reunited one day.
column4: 再见了，鹤城先生。希望有一天我们能重逢。

column3:
Jiwoo showed dedication and hard work 
 in his studies, consistently earning 
 high grades and impressing his 
 teachers with his understanding of math.
column4: Jiwoo 在学习上表现出奉献和努力，一直取得高分，并以他对数学的理解给老师留下了深刻的印象。

column3:
His efforts paid off, as he gained recognition
  for his academic achievements and set a 
 strong foundation for future success.
column4: 他的努力得到了回报，他的学术成就得到了认可，并为未来的成功奠定了坚实的基础。

column3:
And he graduated with flying colors! 
 Everyone applauded his academic achievements
column4: 他以优异的成绩毕业了！每个人都为他的学术成就鼓掌

column3:
The North Korea agents are so upset that 
 they could not reach Mr. Hakseong any more.
column4: 朝鲜特工非常沮丧，以至于他们无法再联系到 Hakseong 先生。

column3:
Jiwoo eventually landed a job as a Math 
 
 researcher at the prestigious Seoul National University.
column4: Jiwoo 最终在著名的首尔国立大学找到了一份数学研究员的工作。

column3:
He quickly made a name for himself in
  the academic community.
column4: 他很快在学术界声名鹊起。

column3:
His work focused on solving complex mathematical 
 problems and developing new theories in the field.
column4: 他的工作重点是解决复杂的数学问题和开发该领域的新理论。

column3:
Oppoturnity eventually came up that there 
 is an cooperation program between South Korea 
 and Germany government. Missing Mr. Hakseong 
 so much, Jiwoo applied for it, hoping to meet 
 Mr. Hakseong if he is fortunate enough.
column4: 机会终于来了，韩国和德国政府之间有一个合作计划。太想念鹤城先生了，智宇申请了，希望有幸见到鹤城先生。

column3:
He finally was able to step on this 
 European country where many 
 great mathematicians were born.
column4: 他终于能够踏上这个诞生了许多伟大数学家的欧洲国家。

column3:
While on one of his work trips,
  Jiwoo had the opportunity
  to meet Mr.Hakseong at the 
 Max-Planck Gesellschaft in Germany.
column4: 在他的一次工作旅行中，Jiwoo 有机会在德国的 Max-Planck Gesellschaft 会见了 Hakseong 先生。

column3:
Jiwoo never forgot the impact Mr.Hakseung 
 had on his career. He was grateful for the 
 lessons he had learned from Hakseung, 
 both academically and personally.
column4: Jiwoo 从未忘记 Hakseung 先生对他职业生涯的影响。他很感激从 Hakseung 那里学到的东西，无论是在学术上还是在个人方面。

column3:
Jiwoo missed the time under 
 Mr. Hakseong's mentoring so much.
column4: Jiwoo非常怀念在Hakseong先生指导下的时光。

column3:
Jiwoo credited much of his success in the 
 field to the lessons he had learned from 
 Hakseung. He believed that the collaboration 
 and exchange of ideas with Hakseung had 
 helped him grow as a mathematician and 
 had pushed him to strive for excellence in his work.
column4: Jiwoo 将他在该领域的成功很大程度上归功于他从 Hakseung 那里学到的教训。他相信与 Hakseung 的合作和思想交流帮助他成长为一名数学家，并促使他在工作中追求卓越。

column3:
Believe it or not, Boram also found 
 her way to Germany. She missed 
 her old friends so much. And without 
 them, math is not as fun for her.
column4: 信不信由你，Boram 也找到了去德国的路。她非常想念她的老朋友。没有它们，数学对她来说就没有那么有趣了。

column3:
Boram wished that she could play 
 some more piano with Mr. Hakseong and Jiwoo.
column4: 宝蓝希望她能和鹤城先生和智宇一起弹更多的钢琴。

column3:
Jiwoo and Mr. Hakseong, as well as Boram,
  proved that the truth and honesty is the most
  valuable thing that will make life and friendship 
 last. Holding unto truth is the true loyalty.
 QED
column4: Jiwoo 和 Hakseong 先生以及 Boram 证明了真实和诚实是使生活和友谊持久的最有价值的东西。坚持真理才是真正的忠诚。 QED
